Note: Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text asks for help for the women physicians in American women's hospitals who are fighting disease in Serbia and the Near East. Illustration shows a women doctor in the Service holding a child with one hand as she removes a snake with her other hand.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
Physical Description: 1 poster : black and yellow ; 57 x 36 cm.
Subject: World War, 1914-1918 -- Women -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Health aspects -- United States.; World War, 1914-1918 -- Propaganda.; War posters, American.;

Title: American Women's Hospitals
